SELECT gt.order_id, gt.from_station AS from_city, gt.arrive_station AS to_city,gt.eop_order_id, CONVERT(gt.ticket_pay_money, CHAR) AS ticket_pay_money,gt.merchant_order_id, CONVERT(gt.bx_pay_money, CHAR) AS bx_pay_money,fy.notify_status, CONVERT(gt.pay_money, CHAR) AS pay_money, gt.order_status, DATE_FORMAT(gt.pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time, DATE_FORMAT(gt.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, gt.train_no, CONCAT(CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(gt.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),CHAR),' ',gt.from_time,':00') AS from_time, gt.out_ticket_billno,gt.merchant_id,me.merchant_name, gt.merchant_id AS user_id,me.merchant_name, gt.out_ticket_type, gt.opt_ren, DATE_FORMAT(gt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, gt.ticket_num FROM gt_orderinfo AS gt LEFT JOIN ext_merchantinfo me ON me.merchant_id=gt.merchant_id LEFT JOIN gt_orderinfo_returnnotify fy ON fy.order_id=gt.order_id WHERE 1 = 1
gt.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
gt.merchant_order_id =#merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#
gt.out_ticket_billno=#out_ticket_billno:VARCHAR#
plat_order_id=#plat_order_id:VARCHAR#
gt.create_time >= #begin_info_time:VARCHAR#
gt.create_time < DATE_ADD(#end_info_time:VARCHAR#,INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order_status in
#order_status[]:VARCHAR#
fy.notify_status in
#notify_status[]:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY gt.create_time DESC LIMIT #everyPagefrom:Integer#, #pageSize:Integer#

SELECT gt.order_id,gt.order_status,gt.merchant_id AS user_id,gt.pay_money, DATE_FORMAT(gt.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time, gt.out_ticket_billno,gt.out_ticket_type,fy.notify_status, DATE_FORMAT(gt.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, NULL AS fund_type,gt.from_station AS from_city,gt.arrive_station AS to_city, gt.from_time from_time, gt.merchant_order_id, gt.arrive_time AS to_time,gt.travel_time, CONVERT(gt.ticket_pay_money,CHAR) AS ticket_pay_money, CONVERT(gt.bx_pay_money,CHAR) AS bx_pay_money, gt.pay_money,gt.train_no,gt.merchant_id AS user_phone,me.merchant_name AS dealer_name, gt.seat_type, gt.buy_money, IFNULL(gt.refund_deadline_ignore,0)AS refund_deadline_ignore,gt.refund_total, gt.link_name,gt.link_phone,gt.out_ticket_billno, IFNULL(gt.refund_deadline_ignore,0)AS refund_deadline_ignore FROM gt_orderinfo AS gt LEFT JOIN ext_merchantinfo me ON me.merchant_id=gt.merchant_id LEFT JOIN gt_orderinfo_returnnotify fy ON fy.order_id=gt.order_id WHERE gt.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

gt.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

gt.merchant_order_id =#merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT cp.cp_id, cp.order_id, cp.user_name, cp.train_box, cp.seat_no, cp.ticket_type, cp.ids_type, cp.user_ids, cp.telephone, cp.create_time, cp.pay_money, cp.buy_money, cp.modify_time, cp.seat_type, bx.bx_id, bx.bx_code, bx.product_id, pr.NAME AS name_type FROM gt_orderinfo_cp cp LEFT JOIN cp_orderinfo_bx bx ON cp.cp_id = bx.cp_id LEFT JOIN ext_productinfo pr ON bx.product_id=pr.product_id WHERE cp.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT bx.bx_id,bx.order_id,bx.from_name,bx.to_name,bx.ids_type,bx.user_name, bx.user_ids,bx.create_time,bx.modify_time,bx.telephone,bx.bx_status, bx.bx_code,bx.bx_billno,bx.pay_money,bx.buy_money FROM cp_orderinfo_bx bx WHERE bx.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT hs.history_id, hs.order_optlog, DATE_FORMAT(hs.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, hs.opter FROM gt_orderinfo_history hs WHERE hs.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# order by hs.create_time asc

SELECT hm.order_id,hm.refund_money, DATE_FORMAT(hm.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')AS create_time, hm.refund_time,hm.user_remark,hm.our_remark, hm.refund_plan_time, hm.refund_status, hm.opt_person,hm.refund_type FROM gt_orderinfo_refundstream hm where hm.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT hc.order_id,hc.order_status,hc.pay_money, DATE_FORMAT(hc.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time, hc.out_ticket_billno,hc.out_ticket_type, DATE_FORMAT(hc.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, NULL AS fund_type,hc.from_station from_city,hc.arrive_station to_city, DATE_FORMAT(hc.from_time,'%H:%i') AS from_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.arrive_time,'%H:%i') AS to_time,hc.travel_time, CONVERT(hc.ticket_pay_money,CHAR) AS ticket_pay_money, CONVERT(hc.bx_pay_money,CHAR) AS bx_pay_money, hc.pay_money,hc.train_no, hc.seat_type, hc.buy_money, IFNULL(hc.refund_deadline_ignore,0)AS refund_deadline_ignore, hc.refund_total FROM gt_orderinfo hc WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
